oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harry T. Burn Christmas Card
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christmas card sent from Harry T. Burn to his mother, Febb Burn. The card was sent during his time practicing law in Rockwood, but the exact date is unknown. The card is a gift from Harry T. Burn, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Christmas cards;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
